aka: 英国国家剧院现场：我们所有人

cast.name: 露西·布莱尔斯 Lucy Briers

this_title: National Theatre Live: All of Us
trans_title: 英国国家剧院现场：我们所有人
introduction: A powerful new play about making a stand.Jess has a great life: a job she loves, a sharp sense of humour and a close group of friends.When austerity threatens the world she has worked hard to build, Jess makes a stand to protect those she holds most dear.Inspired by real life experiences of disabled people in the UK, All of Us captures the humour, sadness and joy of everyday life, and is a passionate and timely look at the human cost of abandoning those who struggle to fit in.
foreign_title: National Theatre Live: All of Us
